channel.title: Error?

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“object”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Tor0eN”))
{
try {
int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13,14));
int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15));
AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
//createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
characterfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(".WorldObjects.cfg"));
characterfile.write("object = “+absX+” “+absy+” “+object”);
characterfile.newLine();

	} catch(IOException ioexception) {
		misc.println(playerName+": error writing file.");
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

[/code]

Do you see any errors in this? If so, let me know.

Read full topic
